name: Kshitiz Khandelwal
about: An investment analyst at GIC and a graduate from IIT Kharagpur with a knack for all things finance. Have previously worked at Deutsche Bank and interned at an early-stage venture capital fund and a couple of renowned fintech startups.

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: Overview: Performing risk management, fundamental analysis and market research for trading and financing deals- Performed market research and formulated a credit risk memo for a S$25Mn financing deal of a Singaporean BNPL player- Developed a cash flow model to forecast the ARR of a European insurance-tech player for a ‚Ç¨50Mn credit financing deal- Formulated client pitch decks on investment opportunities in residential mortgage-backed securities of Australia, Japan & SG

experience.title: Investment Analyst
experience.description: Overview: Evaluation of 50+ global early-stage investment deals in SaaS - KiranaTech, HRTech, TempleTech, TMT, DeepTech, etc.- Engaged with 100+ founders, CXOs and industry stakeholders single-handedly for due diligence on over 10 investment deals- Evaluated multiple early-stage $100K - $1Mn investment deals like Grapevine, Kirana Club, Superfone, DevDarshan, AI Palette, etc.- Built the fund‚Äôs first temple-tech evaluation playbook; formulated investment memos for multiple deals in SaaS/FinTech

experience.title: Summer Analyst
experience.description: Overview: Detecting high volatility equity market regimes for asset allocation during economic downturns- Implemented a top-down asset allocation technique by detecting high volatility market regimes using Hidden Markov Model- Backtested loss mitigation worth 200% by forecasting 15+ Nifty crashes including the Dotcom, Housing, and Corona crises- Engineered a dashboard for analyzing asset allocation between equities and bonds based on the ‚Äòrisk-on risk-off‚Äô theory
experience.description_html: Overview: Detecting high volatility equity market regimes for asset allocation during economic downturns- Implemented a top-down asset allocation technique by detecting high volatility market regimes using Hidden Markov Model- Backtested loss mitigation worth 200% by forecasting 15+ Nifty crashes including the Dotcom, Housing, and Corona crises- Engineered a dashboard for analyzing asset allocation between equities and bonds based on the ‚Äòrisk-on risk-off‚Äô theory <!---->

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Overview: eSaathi is an assistive user interface that provides human-like hand holding for digital apps to over 400Mn technophobes - Conceptualized and formulated the technology stack and business model of a B2B SaaS startup idea eSaathi from scratch- Pitched to 15+ prospective clients in the healthtech, agritech and fintech industries and secured their buy-ins for a pilot run- Spearheaded the Growth Team and conducted over 100 stakeholder interviews and surveys to assess customer pain points- Attracted an investment offer of $100K in the India Innovation Challenge 2021 by Chitkara University from 460+ startup teams

experience.title: Product Intern
